banner.name: Wiktor
banner.subtitle: building modern web apps with Vue.js/React.js and .NET.

about.title: About me
about.text: I’m a Fullstack Developer with over 3 years of experience building modern web applications using React.js, Vue.js, and .NET. I focus on creating clean, scalable, and high-performance solutions. I enjoy combining frontend precision with backend logic while maintaining code quality and effective teamwork.

listItems.details: Tworzenie skalowalnych aplikacji internetowych z wykorzystaniem Vue.js i TypeScript, zintegrowanych z interfejsami API opartymi na ASP.NET oraz bazą danych PostgreSQL. Skoncentrowany na usprawnianiu procesów biznesowych poprzez czystą architekturę i efektywny przepływ danych.

Managing and automating infrastructure in a private cloud environment using Azure Pipelines and Universal Automation Controller. Ensuring high availability and security across Linux and Windows systems.
Maintaining and extending existing client websites, providing ongoing support and web development services using JavaScript and PHP. Focused on improving performance, stability, and functionality.
Building responsive websites and reusable React.js components, designing and maintaining a Next.js starter framework for new projects. Integrated frontend applications with external APIs.

listItems.name: JavaScript Algorithms and Data Structures
listItems.description: Covers core JavaScript concepts, algorithms, and data structures, focusing on writing clean, efficient code.

listItems.name: Learn React: Introduction Course
listItems.description: Introduces React.js fundamentals including components, props, and state management for building interactive UIs.

listItems.name: Microsoft Certified: Azure Fundamentals
listItems.description: Validates understanding of cloud concepts, Azure services, and the basics of DevOps in Microsoft environments.

listItems.name: Responsive Web Design
listItems.description: Focuses on building mobile-friendly layouts using HTML and CSS with modern responsive techniques.

listItems.name: Learn Vue.js Course
listItems.description: Teaches how to build reactive user interfaces with Vue.js, covering components, directives, and data binding.

listItems.name: Introduction to DevOps Course
listItems.description: Provides an overview of DevOps principles including continuous integration, automation, and collaboration.

listItems.name: Learn Bash Scripting Course
listItems.description: Covers automation of repetitive tasks through Bash scripting and core command-line techniques.

listItems.name: Learn the Command Line Course
listItems.description: Teaches essential command-line operations for navigating, managing files, and executing programs efficiently.

listItems.name: Project Management Principles
listItems.description: Introduces core project management methodologies, planning strategies, and team coordination skills.
